mapper.select: SELECT A.TASK_ASSIGN_ID, A.TASK_ID, A.ASSIGN_ID, A.ASSIGN_TYPE, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_CODE, TL.ROLE_NAME, TL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION, R.ENABLE_FLAG, R.END_ACTIVE_DATE FROM SYS_TASK_ASSIGN A, SYS_ROLE_B R LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_TL TL ON ( R.ROLE_ID = TL.ROLE_ID AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) WHERE A.ASSIGN_ID = R.ROLE_ID AND R.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y' AND A.TASK_ID = #{taskId} ORDER BY R.ROLE_CODE ASC

SELECT R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_CODE, TL.ROLE_NAME, TL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION, R.ENABLE_FLAG, R.END_ACTIVE_DATE FROM SYS_ROLE_B R LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_TL TL ON ( R.ROLE_ID = TL.ROLE_ID AND TL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) WHERE R.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y' AND (R.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR R.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= #{currentDate} ) AND (R.START_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR #{currentDate} >= R.start_active_date )
AND R.ROLE_ID NOT IN
#{item}
ORDER BY R.ROLE_CODE ASC
